scripts.db:migrate: PGPASSWORD=devpassword psql -h localhost -p ${PGPORT:-5432} -U postgres -d metaagent -f packages/db/migrations/000_init.sql && PGPASSWORD=devpassword psql -h localhost -p ${PGPORT:-5432} -U postgres -d metaagent -f packages/db/migrations/001_rls_scaffold.sql && PGPASSWORD=devpassword psql -h localhost -p ${PGPORT:-5432} -U postgres -d metaagent -f packages/db/migrations/002_spec_drafts.sql && PGPASSWORD=devpassword psql -h localhost -p ${PGPORT:-5432} -U postgres -d metaagent -f packages/db/migrations/003_builder_nodes_spec_drafts.sql && PGPASSWORD=devpassword psql -h localhost -p ${PGPORT:-5432} -U postgres -d metaagent -f packages/db/migrations/004_builder_artifacts.sql && PGPASSWORD=devpassword psql -h localhost -p ${PGPORT:-5432} -U postgres -d metaagent -f packages/db/migrations/005_pgvector_documents.sql && PGPASSWORD=devpassword psql -h localhost -p ${PGPORT:-5432} -U postgres -d metaagent -f packages/db/migrations/006_pgvector_documents_cosine.sql
scripts.db:migrate:podman: sh -c 'set -e; for f in packages/db/migrations/*.sql; do echo Running $f; cat "$f" | podman exec -i metaagent-postgres psql -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -U postgres -d metaagent; done'
